title: Riven
body: Why cant riot nerv this champ? it isnt balanced anyways. reducing the duration of the shield isnt a solution i think and in my opinion her passive and her ad ratios on her skills are to high. i think the best way to solve this problem ist to give her q a little cooldown between casting, reduce the ad ratios and give her a morr hp at the start and give her higher cooldowns on her e and r.
